resources.string: [CS_528356]_A new Ad-ID will be randomly assigned.
[CS_557084]_You can opt out of receiving personalized ads that use your Ad-ID. If you opt out, you will still receive ads, but they may be less relevant to you. %1$s
[CS_705573]_Learn more about data use and your rights

[CS_533272]_We will collect information about your onscreen actions in these settings and about apps that use your Ad-ID in order to improve our services. For more information on how we use this data, touch %1$s.
[CS_705572]_We will collect information about your onscreen actions in these settings and about apps that use your Ad-ID in order to improve our services.
[CS_557083]_Your Ad-ID (also known as an OAID) is a temporary device identifier used to provide you with personalized ads.
[CS_705568]_You can opt out of receiving personalized ads that use your Ad-ID. If you opt out, you will still receive ads, but they may be less relevant to you.
[CS_555783]_Personalized advertising services recommend content you may be interested in. Your privacy will be protected at all times. For more details, please see the %1$s.
[CS_705569]_Personalized advertising services recommend content that you may be interested in. Your privacy will be protected at all times. For more information, please see the following:

[CS_576623]_The HUAWEI Ads platform provides advertising services for Huawei Mobile Services and third-party apps. If personalized ads are enabled, your personal data may be used to provide you with more relevant and useful ads. To learn more about how your data is used and about your rights, please refer to the %1$s.

[CS_705571]_The HUAWEI Ads platform provides advertising services for Huawei Mobile Services and third-party apps. If personalized ads are enabled, your personal data may be used to provide you with more relevant and useful ads. To learn more about how your data is used and about your rights, please refer to the following:
[CS_863070]_This feature uses federated learning technology to recommend products and services you may like.
